dc:title: The Satan Bomb
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Juxtaposes images of resignation, poverty, and fear over the H-bomb tests with hopeful words from Julian of Norwich and the Mass of the dead. Says we should not fear death but judgement, and live accordingly.
